Being able to work with character strings is an essential skill in data analysis and science.  In this post we'll learn a few of the ways in which the [stringr](https://stringr.tidyverse.org/index.html) package and regular expressions (AKA "regex" or "regexps") makes working with strings in R considerably easier. Click [here](https://craig.rbind.io/post/2020-06-28-asgr-2-3-string-manipulation/) to read the full post.
